ReviewContent: I dont have any photos since I kept my phone off, but I thoroughly enjoyed the food, community, forest setting, and bodywork. Thanks for welcoming me!

ReviewContent: Haven t been recently but have stayed here several times. Great vegan food, good yoga, friendly folks, amazing nature, and then an archery as well as an excellent Buddhist temple is nearby. On sight they have the Hanuman Temple, with a gift shop and Alternative Health Modality services.
Metadata: {"GoogleName": "Mount Madonna Center", "PlaceID": "ChIJ8WPN0g0ZjoARfkm4U6T0JLE", "ReviewIDHash": "02435d1ddc6e6cf800297a473e247c0b", "OwnerResponseText": "Thank you, Trella, for your generous review! We hope you will come visit sometime soon.", "OwnerResponseDate": "2023-05-07 08:53:52.349129", "ReviewLikes": 4, "TotalReviews": 55.0, "LocalGuide": 1.0}

ReviewContent: Beautiful and well maintained Hindu temple. I went on a meditation and mindfulness retreat and stayed for the weekend. The retreat itself was also amazing. As for the space Clean rooms. Small and simple. The atmosphere, fresh air, lush redwoods- all feel healthy and cared for with love. I liked the silence all around most parts of the day. Nice hiking trails along redwoods. The food is simple, clean, vegetarian and vegan. Tasty and creative. Wild turkeys and deer visit the grounds as they are used to people and not being disturbed. I am already looking to go back again

We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your retreat experience as well as the peaceful and healthy environment available to all of our guests. We hope will indeed come back again soon for one of our programs or retreats.", "OwnerResponseDate": "2023-07-07 08:53:52.351359", "ReviewLikes": 1, "TotalReviews": 32.0, "LocalGuide": 0.0}

ReviewContent: Just finished 200 hours Yoga Teacher Training. I highly recommend it. Life changing. Best gift I could give myself turning 50.
Metadata: {"GoogleName": "Mount Madonna Center", "PlaceID": "ChIJ8WPN0g0ZjoARfkm4U6T0JLE", "ReviewIDHash": "dcab10fa781f0e5f154760b08ef664ef", "OwnerResponseText": "Congratulations, Christopher, on receiving your YTT 200 certificate! You were a great student and it was a pleasure to have you in the program! It was apparent to us that you experienced transformation and gained confidence to teach asana, and now have a solid base to continue your practice. Please come visit and practice with us when you can!", "OwnerResponseDate": "2023-07-07 08:53:52.353395", "ReviewLikes": 1, "TotalReviews": 2.0, "LocalGuide": 0.0}

ReviewContent: I stayed here for a Personal retreat night. The place is beautiful and serene. The fog-clad views and the beautiful hiking trails were wonderful. Those who are religiously inclined will find the temple nice albeit a bit crowded on Saturdays. Overall very clean and well-maintained property. However - I was very disappointed with the activities I was planning to do. The Saturday afternoon Yoga class was replaced with something else (not updated on the website), Sunday Yoga class was removed (it was there when we made the reservation). Furthermore, food could be improved. Vegan food can be made tasty, can be kept warm for the duration of the dining hours. The server should be around for the dining hour. The tea bar could have a bit more fruits or other snack options. I would have wanted to come again if some of the basic needs were met.
Metadata: {"GoogleName": "Mount Madonna Center", "PlaceID": "ChIJ8WPN0g0ZjoARfkm4U6T0JLE", "ReviewIDHash": "f54d947005a34fee7469a9cae91da425", "OwnerResponseText": "Dear Gourab De, Thank you for coming for a personal retreat at Mount Madonna and for sharing your feedback about your stay. We strive to provide a high quality guest experience. Your comments will help us to improve our services, specifically in the area of activities and meals. We have followed up with you directly and hope that you will come visit again soon and find that all of your needs are met.", "OwnerResponseDate": "2023-05-07 08:53:52.357505", "ReviewLikes": 2, "TotalReviews": 3.0, "LocalGuide": 0.0}

ReviewContent: I took the 200 hour teacher training course online and it was well put-together, with excellent instruction and dedicated staff.  The people are honorable and attentive to students needs.
Metadata: {"GoogleName": "Mount Madonna Center", "PlaceID": "ChIJ8WPN0g0ZjoARfkm4U6T0JLE", "ReviewIDHash": "07535e3267d20382abb3f0fa027875c1", "OwnerResponseText": "Thank you, Anne, for your generous words about your experience. We are grateful for your participation in Mount Madonna Institutes 200 hour teacher training. May your practice bring you peace!", "OwnerResponseDate": "2023-05-07 08:53:52.359255", "ReviewLikes": 0, "TotalReviews": 7.0, "LocalGuide": 0.0}

ReviewContent: Authentic hindu temple in the midst of mountains. Beautiful and serene place. Unlike most of the bay area temples that are designed inside a simple hall, this temple is authentic in the design of a Hindu temple. It is specially dedicated to Hanuman ji and shiv ji. The surrounding area is blissful and serene. The drive to this place is also quite beautiful. Worth coming here for darshan and just spending some time in peace among the mountains.  There is a small shop that serves samosa and tea also. The place offers a retreat center and yoga center and overnight stay but I didnt experience those.
Metadata: {"GoogleName": "Mount Madonna Center", "PlaceID": "ChIJ8WPN0g0ZjoARfkm4U6T0JLE", "ReviewIDHash": "6fb85df179693313610bfa84eca0f99e", "OwnerResponseText": "Dear Aditya, We are happy that you enjoyed your visit to the Sanka  Mochan Hanum n Temple! Thank you for sharing about your experience -- we do our best to make our guests stay peaceful and comfortable. We invite you to come again and enjoy the other facilities and programs offered, including Ayurvedic consultations and other wellness treatments, personal retreats, and yoga and meditation group retreats. Until next time, wishing you peace, joy, and health!", "OwnerResponseDate": "2023-05-07 08:53:52.360997", "ReviewLikes": 2, "TotalReviews": 119.0, "LocalGuide": 1.0}

ReviewContent: An amazing place for reflection, relaxation, connection with nature, and exploration.

ReviewContent: Fourth time visiting, first post-covid. As peaceful,  tranquil, rejuvenating as ever. The snack shop and bookstore are closed unless youre an overnight guest.

I took online Yoga Teacher Training (200hr), the program and the faculty who put it all together were incredible. I learned about way more than I thought I would, I cant wait to visit the center and meet some of my teachers in person some day

A great place to visit. You can visit the Sankat Mochan Hanuman temple and retreat center there. The atmosphere is very  calm and cool. The view around the retreat center is wonderful. There is a small store for shopping. Where you can buy books and other stuffs. This place is surrounded by redwoods. Everything is just Beautiful...
Heaven

Came for the liberation retreat and had an amazing time. There is definitely a Hindu presence (Hanuman and Ganesh temples) but I never felt out of place as an atheist. Tolerant, welcoming, genuinely kind-hearted group of people. I felt like I was able to really deepen my Asana and meditation practice here, and it felt good for the soul being surrounded by beautiful redwoods and foggy mountains.
Peaceful natural location for a retreat. I loved being surrounded by the redwoods.
Very pleasant and great place to experience.

There are great views of the valley and bay below. Theres a Hindu temple dedicated to Hanuman. I really like the natural scenery and there are places here that are so, so quiet and still, especially if the wind is calm. It was hard to stay away from those spots. You may even walk up on a group of deer.

Wonderful place for a private retreat. The people who live and work there are kind, peaceful, and very welcoming. The vegetarian meals offered are simple but very flavorful, I stayed in a cabin and it was remote enough for quietude but convenient to the restrooms and rest of the facilities.

ReviewContent: Quiet height blue sky free mind.
A very great surprise An Sank mochan hanuman temple
Great place to visit.

Dont get me wrong, its beautiful here. But if you come attached to a group, like I did, be warned -- they dont serve real food here, the only place to get coffee is on Monday, and if you decide you need to eat something other than soggy carrots its a half hour drive to anywhere else.
Nice, quite, good family hangout.
Peace full place to be and attend aarti in the evening
Calm place
Nice place
Excellent place for peace of mind and worship. I enjoy going there. Jai Bajra Ang Bali Ki.

A beautiful, welcoming place to visit, take a personal or group retreat. Friendly, warm staff welcome you. The peace and beauty will enter your every pore and you will leave with new found love of life, peace of mind, and joy in your heart. Im not kidding. Its that wonderful.  I cannot wait to return!
Love this place! Its lovely and everyone there is so nice :-)
Very quiet and peaceful place. Simply the best
amazing beautiful place..!! Spend time at the Hanuman temple and evening Aarti..so peaceful and serene. Jai Shree Ram!! Jai Hanuman!!
A very good place for pluralists, spiritual people, truth seekers, and those focused on self improvement to visit. The Sankat Mochan Hanuman Mandir (temple) is adjacent, as is a cafe.
The real thing
Peace
Jai Hanuman!
This is a beautiful place. Very quiet and tranquil.
